text: "The Voice of China" is a children's singing talent show launched by Hunan TV Golden Eagle Cartoon TV in March 2013. The main selection targets are children under the age of 14, with the aim of creating a " Chinese Dream " style of children's music. The first season of the show was opened to the public for registration on March 21, 2013 and premiered on the Golden Eagle Cartoon TV on May 11 of the same year. However, due to the "song restriction order" issued by the State Administration of Radio, Film and Television, the show was terminated early on July 28. The second season premiered on May 31, 2014 and concluded on August 23 of the same year. The third season premiered on July 11, 2015 and concluded on October 3 of the same year. The fourth season premiered on July 2, 2016 and concluded on September 17 of the same year. The fifth season began airing on July 28, 2018 and ended on October 13 of the same year.
title: China's New Voice
